name: extract-access-key
description: Extrator de Chaves de Acesso de arquivos PDF

scripts.build:win:optimized: npm run build:win && powershell -Command "$localesPath = 'dist\ExtractAccessKey-win32-x64\locales'; $keep = @('pt-BR.pak', 'en-US.pak', 'en-GB.pak'); Get-ChildItem -Path $localesPath -Filter '*.pak' | Where-Object { $keep -notcontains $_.Name } | Remove-Item -Force; Write-Host 'Locales otimizados (mantidos apenas pt-BR, en-US, en-GB)'"
scripts.build:win:zip: npm run build:win:optimized && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path 'dist\ExtractAccessKey-win32-x64' -DestinationPath 'dist\ExtractAccessKey-win32-x64.zip' -Force; $size = [math]::Round((Get-Item 'dist\ExtractAccessKey-win32-x64.zip').Length / 1MB, 2); Write-Host ('ZIP criado: dist\ExtractAccessKey-win32-x64.zip (' + $size + ' MB)')"

author: ExtractAccessKey
